misdeed: Ships passing through a particular stretch of coastline have begun to vanish without a trace, their wreckage never found. The few survivors tell of haunting songs and a chilling presence beneath the waves.
solution: The Vaesen is a Mermaid and can be placated with offerings of trinkets and treasures or driven away by the presence of a married man wearing his wedding ring.

clues.description: Sailors whisper of a beautiful woman with a fish’s tail who lures ships to their doom with her enchanting voice.
Strange, bioluminescent lights dance beneath the water’s surface at night, as if something beckons from the depths.
Fish are scarce in the area, and those that are caught are often mangled and bear strange bite marks.
A sailor’s cap is found washed ashore, containing a single, iridescent scale and a lock of long, seaweed-tangled hair.
The sea seems unnaturally calm and quiet near the site of the disappearances, as if holding its breath.
A carved wooden comb is recovered from a piece of driftwood. It is intricately carved with images of fish and mermaids.

plotTwist.description: A young woman, heartbroken after her lover was lost at sea, has unwittingly formed a bond with the Vaesen, believing it holds the key to reuniting her with her beloved.
